source_item.name: Lesser Rune of the Void Ritual

effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to hit a Jackpot! that fires a Barbed Shot at 100% effectiveness. Casting Bestial Wrath always hits a Jackpot!

Set: Hitting a Jackpot! infuses your pet with a mutagen, causing its auto-attacks to deal 18,050 Nature damage to its target and up to 5 enemies within 10 yds for 8 sec. Mutagenic attacks reduce the cooldown of Bestial Wrath by 0.3 sec.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

spells.description: Equip: Your gear warms with Woven Dawnthread and gains 756 Critical Strike when over 80% health.

spells.description: Use: Deal yourself in, granting you 7,731 to 9,450 Mastery for 15 sec and stacking the deck. Stacking the deck increases the minimum Mastery on future hands by 286 until you leave combat, up to 3 times. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

name: Improvised Seaforium Pacemaker

spells.description:
Equip: Repurpose a Seaforium charge to give your heart a kick, causing your first ability every 60 sec to trigger Explosive Adrenaline, granting 3,210 Critical Strike for 15 sec.

While exploding, Critical Strikes cause you to blow up again, extending this duration by 1 sec, up to 15 times.

description: It's just crazy enough to work...

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Thori'dal, the Stars' Fury

name: Tabard of the Lightbringer

spells.description: Use: Suffuses the wearer with the Light. (30 Min Cooldown)

description: May you always bring light into dark places.
